name: The Adventure Of Fox
description:
In a far far away forest, there is a tiny fox. He is curious on everything. When he know there is a larger thing outside, he decide to travel over the world to know how big the world is. The one thing you can help is collect food to support him.

Because the travel is very, very long so you need to make it as a combo to make him easy to carry.

Let feed this fox with the food you have.
More places, there will be more food he want to easy.

Now make a travel with the tiny fox and discovery the world.

Guide: Connect all similar item near the last item to make a serial for tiny fox
